value:
My father left our family behind,
so my brother left to search for
him... Where are you, Ced?

I am not a knight yet, but my mother
was a pegasus knight. She said that
she fought alongside Lord Sigurd!

Mother's illness was...unusual.
Ced told me that our father was
the only one who could cure it.

Though my father and brother can be
selfish, I believe they would join the
fight against the empire.$k$pThat is why I decided to join the
liberation army.

I named my pegasus after my
aunt Annand. She is a famous
hero in Silesse!

My name is Fee! Let this be a token
of continued friendship between you
and $Nf!

When I return to Silesse, it will be
as a full-fledged pegasus knight!
Yes! That's the spirit!

Are you all right, Annand? Just keep
in the air a little longer!

My father and brother failed our
family, so I have to work even
harder to make up for that!

My name is Fee! I hail from Silesse.
You haven't seen my brother around,
have you?

I mentioned before that my father
went missing. My mother, Erinys,
waited for his return dutifully.$k$pSoon, Ced left to search for Father.
In the end, I was the only one there
when our mother died.$k$pWhy?! Why would Father just leave
us like that? It was heartbreaking to
watch Mother get sick alone...$k$pI cannot forgive him. I refuse to say
a word to him until he apologizes
before my mother's grave!$k$pWhy are you looking at me like that?
Huh? Oh... I-I didn't realize I had
started crying.$k$pI didn't mean to let my guard down
in such a way. I swore I would never
cry in front of others, but...$k$pYou are so kind and easy to talk to.
Thank you for always listening to me,
$Nu!
What a fool!
I have to do my best!
Unforgivable!
Greetings!
Ced...
My name is Fee. I am part of Isaach's liberation army.
*gasp* Please behave yourself.
No one knows where my father is. Even still, my mother always believed he'd come back one day...
Ced left me and mother at home, saying he would search for father.
I've always wanted to be the kind of hero that gets talked about in stories, like Sigurd and his allies.
I will see you again someday, Brother...
I'll admit, I thought you strange at first. But you turned out to be a decent person after all!
All right!
Hm...
That's the spirit!
